subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Nets’ starters, who include Paul Pierce and Kevin Garnett, have combined for 381 playoff starts; no starter on the third-seeded Raptors has even one.
snippet: The Nets’ starters, who include Paul Pierce and Kevin Garnett, have combined for 381 playoff starts; no starter on the third-seeded Raptors has even one.
